API Reference¶

Notes¶

class noteutil.Line(content: str, nindex: int, lindex: int, rcontent: str, prefix: str, extensions: dict, categories: list, tabs, fmt)¶

A single token of notes.

content¶

The actual content of the Line; all of the text that was found in between separators.

Type:str
nindex¶

The Note index that corresponds to the position in the NoteUtil.notes_list.

Type:int
lindex¶

The Line index that corresponds to the position in the NoteUtil.lines_list.

Type:int
extensions¶

A dict of the extensions that this Line has with key: Extension.name and value Extension.

Type:Dict[str : Extension]
categories¶

An unsorted list of all of the categories this Line belongs to.

Type:List[Category]
class noteutil.Pair(content: str, nindex: int, pindex: int, separator: str, rcontent: str, prefix: str, extensions: dict, categories: list, tabs, fmt)¶

A single token of notes with a separator that splits a term and a definition.

content¶

The actual content of the notes; all of the text that was found in between separators.

Type:str
nindex¶

The note index that corresponds to the position in the NoteUtil.notes_list.

Type:int
pindex¶

The pair index that corresponds to the position in the NoteUtil.pairs_list.

Type:int
separator¶

The string that separates the key and value (term and definition) of the notes token.

Type:str
term¶

The first part that came before the separator.

Type:str
definition¶

The second part that came after the separator.

Type:str
extensions¶

A dict of the extensions that this Pair has with key: Extension.name and value Extension.

Type:Dict[str : Extension]
categories¶

An unsorted list of all of the categories this Note belongs to.

Type:List[Category]

Extensions¶

class noteutil.LineExtension(content: str, name: str, eindex: int, rcontent: str, cindex: int, note: noteutil.notes.Note, placeholder: str, before: bool, lbound: str, rbound: str, fmt)¶
content¶

The content of the extension excluding bounds.

Type:str
name¶

The name assigned to this extension, used as a key in NoteUtil.extension_dict.

Type:str
eindex¶

The Extension index that corresponds to the position in the list found with NoteUtil.extension_dict[Extension.name]

Type:int
note¶

The Note that this extension was found in.

Type:Note
class noteutil.PairExtension(content: str, name: str, eindex: int, separator: str, rcontent: str, cindex: int, note: noteutil.notes.Note, placeholder: str, before: bool, lbound: str, rbound: str, fmt)¶
content¶

The content of the extension excluding bounds.

Type:str
name¶

The name assigned to this extension, used as a key in NoteUtil.extension_dict.

Type:str
eindex¶

The Extension index that corresponds to the position in the list found with NoteUtil.extension_dict[Extension.name]

Type:int
separator¶

The string that separates the key and value (term and definition) of this extension’s content.

Type:str
term¶

The first part that came before the separator.

Type:str
definition¶

The second part that came after the separator.

Type:str
note¶

The Note that this extension was found in.

Type:Note
class noteutil.ListExtension(content: str, name: str, eindex: int, separators: list, rcontent: str, cindex: int, note: noteutil.notes.Note, placeholder: str, before: bool, lbound: str, rbound: str, fmt)¶
content¶

The content of the extension excluding bounds.

Type:str
name¶

The name assigned to this extension, used as a key in NoteUtil.extension_dict.

Type:str
eindex¶

The Extension index that corresponds to the position in the list found with NoteUtil.extension_dict[Extension.name]

Type:int
separators¶

The first string separates each ListElement. Any later strings indicate the prefix needed to nest the element a certain number of tabs.

Warning

There must be at least one separator in separators.

Type:List[str]
elements¶

All elements created from the tokens between the separators.

Type:List[ListElement]
note¶

The Note that this extension was found in.

Type:Note
class noteutil.ListElement(ucontent: str, content: str, list_ext: noteutil.extensions.ListExtension, tabs: int)¶
content¶

The content of the element, including any prefixes.

Type:str
ucontent¶

Unmodified content, what was the content before any additional formatting.

Type:str
list_ext¶

The ListExtension that this element belongs to.

Type:ListExtension
class noteutil.BulletListExtension(content: str, name: str, eindex: int, separators: list, bullets: list, spaces: int, rcontent: str, cindex: int, note: noteutil.notes.Note, placeholder: str, before: bool, lbound: str, rbound: str, fmt)¶
content¶

The content of the extension excluding bounds.

Type:str
name¶

The name assigned to this extension, used as a key in NoteUtil.extension_dict.

Type:str
eindex¶

The Extension index that corresponds to the position in the list found with NoteUtil.extension_dict[Extension.name]

Type:int
separators¶

The first string separates each ListElement. Any later strings indicate the prefix needed to nest the element a certain number of tabs.

Warning

There must be at least one separator in separators.

Type:List[str]
bullets¶

The bullets that will be used to prefix each element. The first string will be the bullet of the ListElement with no tabs, second with one tab, etc.

Note

If there are fewer bullets than separators, the bullets will repeat starting from the beginning.

Warning

There must be at least one bullet in bullets.

Type:List[str]
spaces¶

The number of spaces between the bullet and the content of the ListElement.

Type:int
elements¶

All elements created from the tokens between the separators.

Type:List[ListElement]
note¶

The Note that this extension was found in.

Type:Note
class noteutil.NumberListExtension(content: str, name: str, eindex: int, separators: list, continuous: bool, rcontent: str, cindex: int, note: noteutil.notes.Note, placeholder: str, before: bool, lbound: str, rbound: str, fmt)¶
content¶

The content of the extension excluding bounds.

Type:str
name¶

The name assigned to this extension, used as a key in NoteUtil.extension_dict.

Type:str
eindex¶

The Extension index that corresponds to the position in the list found with NoteUtil.extension_dict[Extension.name]

Type:int
separators¶

The first string separates each ListElement. Any later strings indicate the prefix needed to nest the element a certain number of tabs.

Warning

There must be at least one separator in separators.

Type:List[str]
continuous¶

Whether to continue the number sequence if the next ListElement has a different number of tabs.

Type:bool
elements¶

All elements created from the tokens between the separators.

Type:List[ListElement]
note¶

The Note that this extension was found in.

Type:Note
